answers.answer: Have they tested for yeast? and it came back positive?  I dealt with a vulva itch for 5 years and no one could tell me why until now.  I have VIN stage 1 and 2.  Please research vulval intra-epithelial neoplasia.  It is not common but I saw so many dr who didnt diagnose it and its probably more common just not being diagnosed until too late.

question: Im 53 yr old femal with Type II Diabetes as well as High Blood presure... I have have a reoccuring yeast infectionand/or bactierial infection. I am sexually active but I do use protection. I have been given by my doctor medication which clears it up but then it comes back again. Any ideas whats going on with me! Im getting very tired of this issue
title: Yeat Infections
